title: Michael Graves, Renowned Architect Who Designed Products For Target, Dies
teaser: Renowned architect and industrial designer Michael Graves has died at the age of 80. Graves is perhaps, best-known for designing household objects for Target.
contentencoded:
Renowned architect and industrial designer Michael Graves has died at the age of 80. Graves is perhaps, best-known for designing household objects for Target. In his later years, he was paralyzed and turned to designing for the disabled.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
